entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:29 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
